dict.acceptation: 距离，路程；远处；疏远；（时间的）间隔，长久；
把…远远甩在后面；疏远；与…保持距离；

sent.orig: The relative Weighted Euclidean Distance(WED) classifier is proposed as an improvement of the classifier.
sent.trans: 通过对WED(Weighted Euclidean Distance)分类器的改进研究，提出了相对WED分类器的新概念，进一步提高了系统的识别能力。

sent.orig: The max distance shows the maximum possible distance available with time defined in record time.
sent.trans: 最大距离显示在已记录时间中的定义的时间尺度内，可能的可用距离的最大值。

sent.orig: A and B is defined as the distance between the corresponding location and distance characters.
sent.trans: 和B的距离定义为相应位置字符距离之和。

sent.orig: Angular distance is the distance between two objects measured as an angle from a given point.
sent.trans: 角距离，是由一定点到两物体之间所量度的夹角。

sent.orig: On long-distance car or long-distance plane, can become his shoulder pillow.
sent.trans: 在长途车或长途飞机上，可将他的肩膀当枕头。
